channel.description: Hai der, i was just wondering what to merchant in p2p. I want it to be safe. So i am gaurenteed to get wat i bought it for and or make more profit..So please give your opinons :)

item.title: Best things to merchant..? P2P
item.dc:creator: @Vengeance Vengeance
item.description:
@Vengeance wrote:

Hi, I dont know if you already know of this but Steel Bar merching is very effective.
Buy them on the forums or anywhere else you might know
Steel Bars are in high demand and probably buying them shouldnt be to hard either.
Buy them 500 each and sell them 600 each. Ex. Buy 2k steel bars 1m sell 1.2m.
Easy 200k in maybe 20-30 minutes if your fast

Read full topic

item.title: Best things to merchant..? P2P
item.dc:creator: @Divine-Devil Divine-Devil
item.description:
@Divine-Devil wrote:

Well what I used to no life at was to

Bring 12k go to the ardy general store, buy water filled vials 12 gp each. Then bank em.

1k vials = 12k, then sell for 250k on forums :). Used to be good. Takes like an hour for 1k, but people buy em a lot now (they buy from store) :(. But the profit is good. 4k vials = 4 hours = 1m, for me atleast.

Read full topic

item.title: Best things to merchant..? P2P
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

I usually take out about 500k, buy sell, then store it again and you’ll see your money rise. Your best bet is:

Rune boots: 180k sell for 200k
obby shield: 250k sell for 300k

sell and you make a 120k profit.

item.title: Best things to merchant..? P2P
item.dc:creator: @whothe0 the fu superior
item.description:
@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“acheron, post:10, topic:133346”]you have to be patient to make a LOT of money in runescape.
for example(this is what im currently doing to make a lot of money)

i sell cowhidess for 100gp each.
you can only hold 28 items before you run out of space.
so what i do is that i collect 28 ch(cowhides)in around 10 min.
so here is the math.
28 x 5 equals 112.
meanibg that you could get aroun 11,200 k for just 112 ch!!!
now if you want to make a lot of money then you have to have even more patience.
Another example.(still w/ the cowhides)
if u want to make more than 100,000k in 1 week then u have to get around 1000 cowhides or more.
so this is how you start.
in 1hr you could collect around 62 cowhides.
now lets multiply!!
62ch:1hr
now 62ch x 20hrs equals 1240 cowhides wich when multiplied by 100gp each you get 124000k in 20 hours!!!
i know it might not be the best way to make money but is working for me.
there is this guy who buys cowhides 100gp.
if u want his username then add me poseidon422 in runescape.

remember with more money comes greater responsability and a hell lot more fun!!![/quote]

in 5 mins i can get like 3 full loads

Read full topic

item.title: Best things to merchant..? P2P
item.dc:creator: @acheron acheron
item.description:
@acheron wrote:

you have to be patient to make a LOT of money in runescape.
for example(this is what im currently doing to make a lot of money)

i sell cowhidess for 100gp each.
you can only hold 28 items before you run out of space.
so what i do is that i collect 28 ch(cowhides)in around 10 min.
so here is the math.
28 x 5 equals 112.
meanibg that you could get aroun 11,200 k for just 112 ch!!!
now if you want to make a lot of money then you have to have even more patience.
Another example.(still w/ the cowhides)
if u want to make more than 100,000k in 1 week then u have to get around 1000 cowhides or more.
so this is how you start.
in 1hr you could collect around 62 cowhides.
now lets multiply!!
62ch:1hr
now 62ch x 20hrs equals 1240 cowhides wich when multiplied by 100gp each you get 124000k in 20 hours!!!
i know it might not be the best way to make money but is working for me.
there is this guy who buys cowhides 100gp.
if u want his username then add me poseidon422 in runescape.

remember with more money comes greater responsability and a hell lot more fun!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Best things to merchant..? P2P
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Theres an easy way and a hard way, the easy way being merchant. Buy low sell high - this doesn’t always work. It could take several weeks to make a profit merchanting, and it could still be very low. Then you have the ever so popular ‘Unid’ - Unidentified herb - Which has made people quite the profit for years, raking in 300-500k a day of work. Steel bars have been popular since RSC, buying the ores and smithing them, Selling the made bars for a decent profit, while gaining a high smithing level.

With a bit of work put into it, you make more of a profit faster, with the benefit of skill exp added.

Read full topic
